tables.payment_currency:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_payment_currency` (
  `currency_code` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `currency_name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `currency_symbol` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `currency_active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `currency_position` enum('Standard','Left','Right') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Standard',
  `currency_precision` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '2',
  `currency_script` tinyint(64) DEFAULT NULL,
  `currency_format` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL,
  `currency_display` enum('No Symbol','Use Symbol','Use Shortname','Use Name') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Use Symbol',
  PRIMARY KEY (`currency_code`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.payment_gateway:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_payment_gateway` (
  `gateway_id` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `gateway_title` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `gateway_description` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT '',
  `gateway_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `gateway_admin_form` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `gateway_params_text` mediumblob,
  `gateway_test_mode` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `gateway_sort_order` smallint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  PRIMARY KEY (`gateway_id`),
  KEY `enabled` (`gateway_active`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
